member.name: M:XPlat.Droid.ApplicationModel.Manifest.ApplicationManifestManager.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: When using the default constructor, the CurrentActivity property must be set in order to request permissions.

member.name: M:XPlat.Droid.ApplicationModel.Manifest.ApplicationManifestManager.#ctor(Android.App.Activity)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:XPlat.Droid.ApplicationModel.Manifest.IApplicationManifestManager.CurrentActivity
member.summary: Gets or sets the current activity.

member.name: M:XPlat.Droid.ApplicationModel.Manifest.IApplicationManifestManager.CheckContentProviderExists(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether a content provider exists.
member.param: The name of the provider to check.
member.returns: When this method completes, true will be returned if the provider exists.

member.name: M:XPlat.Droid.ApplicationModel.Manifest.IApplicationManifestManager.RequestPermissionAsync(System.String[])
member.summary: Requests for permissions to be granted.
member.param: The list of permissions that need to be granted.
member.returns: When this method completes, true will be returned if all the permissions requested were granted.

member.name: M:XPlat.Droid.ApplicationModel.Manifest.IApplicationManifestManager.CheckPermissionGranted(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether a permission is granted.
member.returns: When this method completes, true will be returned if the permission has been granted.
